UniprotID	P41231
Accession	P41231;B2R9W3;Q96EM8
EntryName	P2RY2_HUMAN
ProteinName	P2Y purinoceptor 2 (P2Y2) (ATP receptor) (P2U purinoceptor 1) (P2U1) (P2U receptor 1) (Purinergic receptor)
GeneName	P2RY2 P2RU1
Length	377
Function	Receptor for ATP and UTP coupled to G-proteins that activate a phosphatidylinositol-calcium second messenger system. The affinity range is UTP = ATP > ATP-gamma-S >> 2-methylthio-ATP = ADP.
Subcellular Location	Cell membrane
